name: PKPushRegistryDelegate
desc: The methods that you use to handle incoming PushKit notifications and registration events.

items.name: func pushRegistry(PKPushRegistry, didUpdate: PKPushCredentials, for: PKPushType)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the system updated the credentials for the specified type of push notification.

items.name: func pushRegistry(PKPushRegistry, didInvalidatePushTokenFor: PKPushType)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the system invalidated the push token for the specified type.

items.name: func pushRegistry(PKPushRegistry, didReceiveIncomingPushWith: PKPushPayload, for: PKPushType, completion: () -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a remote push notification arrived.
